metadata.title: CVE-2024-35972 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bnxt_en: Fix possible memory leak in bnxt_rdma_aux_device_init()If ulp = kzalloc() fails, the allocated edev will leak because it isnot properly assigned and the cleanup path will not be able to free it.Fix it by assigning it properly immediately after allocation.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
